summary: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.
cast: Monica Bellucci|Vincent Cassel|Albert Dupontel|Jo Prestia|Philippe Nahon|Stéphane Drouot|Jean-Louis Costes|Mick Gondouin|Mourad Khima|Hellal|Nato|Fesche|Jara-Millo|Le Quellec|Isabelle Giami|Fatima Adoum|Foulaux|Stéphane Derdérian|Christophe Lemaire|Eric Moreau|Gaspar Noé|Titof
title: Irreversible
